column1: '''Narquelië''' was the tenth month of the year
column2: according to the [[Kings' Reckoning|Kings']] and [[Stewards' Reckoning]] of [[Gondor]]
column3: and the seventh month according to the [[New Reckoning]]; following the month of [[Yavannië]] in the [[Kings' Reckoning]]
column4: the harvest feast of [[Yáviérë]] in the Stewards' Reckoning
column6: and preceding [[Hísimë]] in all 3 calendars. Narquelië in the Kings' and Stewards' Reckoning corresponded to [[Winterfilth]] in the [[Shire Calendar]] (approximately modern [[22 September]] through [[21 October]]).<ref>{{App|Calendars}}</ref>
